notice.content: Google does not allow Person as the Publisher for articles. Organization will be used instead.
Google does not allow Person as the Publisher for articles. Organization will be used instead.

field.label: Cost
field.help: The estimated cost of the supplies consumed when performing instructions.

field.label: Category
field.help: The pricing category of the course.

field.label: Price
field.help: The available price available for your course.

field.label: Number Of Courses
field.help: The numerical value for how long the course lasts for, in Frequency units.

field.label: Frequency
field.help: The duration and repeatCount properties are relative to this field.

field.label: Course Duration
field.help: ISO 8601 duration format. Note! Don't specify the entire length of the course with this property.

field.label: Start Date
field.help: Date and time of the course

field.label: End Date
field.help: End date and time of the course

field.label: Event Attendance Mode
field.help: Indicates whether the event occurs online, offline at a physical location, or a mix of both online and offline.

field.label: Online Event URL
field.help: The URL of the online event, where people can join. This property is required if your event is happening online

field.label: Start Date
field.help: Date and time of the event

field.label: End Date
field.help: End date and time of the event

field.label: Price
field.help: The lowest available price available for your tickets, including service charges and fees.

field.label: Price Valid From
field.help: The date from which the price becomes available

field.label: Price Valid Until
field.help: The date after which the price will no longer be available

field.label: Episode Duration
field.help: ISO 8601 duration format. Example: PT37M. More details

field.label: Audio File URL
field.help: Fully-qualified URL of the episode audio file, including the format extension (for example, .wav, .mp3)

field.label: Season Number
field.help: Position of the season within an ordered group of seasons (1, 2, 3, etc).

field.label: Episode Number
field.help: Position of the episode within an ordered group of episodes (1, 2, 3, etc).

field.label: Salary (Recommended)
field.help: Insert amount, e.g. 50.00, or a salary range, e.g. 40.00-50.00

field.label: Date Posted
field.help: The original date on which employer posted the job. You can leave it empty to use the post publication date as job posted date

field.label: Expiry Posted
field.help: The date when the job posting will expire. If a job posting never expires, or you do not know when the job will expire, do not include this property

field.label: Unpublish when expired
field.help: If checked, post status will be changed to Draft and its URL will return a 404 error, as required by the Rich Result guidelines

field.label: Employment Type (Recommended)
field.help: Type of employment. You can choose more than one value

field.label: Hiring Organization
field.help: The name of the company. Leave empty to use your own company information.

field.label: Organization URL (Recommended)
field.help: The URL of the organization offering the job position. Leave empty to use your own company information

field.label: Organization Logo (Recommended)
field.help: Logo URL of the organization offering the job position. Leave empty to use your own company information

field.label: Posting ID (Recommended)
field.help: The hiring organization's unique identifier for the job. Leave empty to use the post ID

field.label: Profile URL
field.help: Social profiles URLs of the company.

field.label: Logo URL
field.help: The image must be 112x112px, at minimum

field.label: Description
field.help: The user's byline or applicable credential, if applicable.

field.label: Job title
field.help: The job title of the person (for example, Financial Manager).

field.label: Job title
field.help: The job title of the person (for example, Financial Manager).

field.label: Price Valid Until
field.help: The date after which the price will no longer be available

field.label: URL
field.help: The canonical URL of the reviewed item. If the item is on this page, let the default URL pattern.

field.label: Rating Count
field.help: The number of people who provided a review

field.label: Price Valid From
field.help: The date after which the price will no longer be available

field.label: Price Valid Until
field.help: The date after which the price will no longer be available

field.label: No. of bedrooms
field.help: The total integer number of bedrooms.

field.label: Pets allowed
field.help: Indicates whether pets are allowed to enter.

field.label: Type
field.help: Type of dish, for example appetizer, or dessert.

field.label: Cuisine
field.help: The cuisine of the recipe (for example, French or Ethiopian).

field.label: Keywords
field.help: Other terms for your recipe such as the season, the holiday, or other descriptors. Separate multiple entries with commas.

field.label: Recipe Yield
field.help: Quantity produced by the recipe, for example "4 servings". For Guided Recipes, the type must be Integer

field.label: Calories
field.help: The number of calories in the recipe. Optional.

field.label: Recipe Ingredients
field.help: Recipe ingredients, add one ingredient per line.

field.label: Content URL
field.help: A URL pointing to the actual video media file

field.label: Cuisine
field.help: The type of cuisine the restaurant serves. Separate multiple entries with commas.

field.label: Menu URL
field.help: URL pointing to the menu of the restaurant.

field.label: Service Type
field.help: The type of service being offered, e.g. veterans' benefits, emergency relief, etc.

field.label: Price Valid From
field.help: The date after which the price will no longer be available

field.label: Price Valid Until
field.help: The date after which the price will no longer be available

field.label: Price Valid From
field.help: The date after which the price will no longer be available

field.label: Price Valid Until
field.help: The date after which the price will no longer be available

field.label: Processor
field.help: Processor architecture required to run the application (e.g. IA64).

field.label: Platforms
field.help: The electronic systems used to play video games. (e.g. iOS, PlayStation 3)

field.label: Official rating
field.help: Official rating of a piece of content. (e.g. MPAA PG-13)

field.label: Play Mode
field.help: Indicates whether this game is multi-player, co-op or single-player. (e.g. SinglePlayer)

field.label: Genre
field.help: Genre of the creative work, broadcast channel or group. (e.g. Action Role-playing game)

field.label: Languages
field.help: The language of the content or performance or used in an action. (e.g. Chinese)

field.label: Price Valid From
field.help: The date after which the price will no longer be available

field.label: Price Valid Until
field.help: The date after which the price will no longer be available

field.label: Content URL
field.help: A URL pointing to the actual video media file

field.label: Embed URL
field.help: A URL pointing to the embeddable player for the video

field.label: Name
field.help: A descriptive title for the content of the clip.

field.label: Start Offset
field.help: The start time of the clip expressed as the number of seconds from the beginning of the work.

field.label: End Offset
field.help: The end time of the clip expressed as the number of seconds from the beginning of the work.

field.label: Url
field.help: A URL that points to the start time of the clip.

field.label: Movie Image
field.help: An image that represents the movie.

field.label: Alternate Name
field.help: This value is displayed in the fact check in search results.

field.label: Position
field.help: The item's position in the carousel. This is a 1-based number.

field.label: URL
field.help: The canonical URL of the item detail page. All URLs in the list must be unique, but live on the same domain

field.label: Schema Type
field.help: Select the schema type you already added on the specified URL

field.label: Position
field.help: The item's position in the breadcrumbs list.

field.label: Name
field.help: All names in the list must be unique

field.label: Url
field.help: The URL of the current item. All URLs in the list must be unique
